review:
meih ishq uska woh aashiqui hai meri woh ladki nahi zindagi hai meri...
teri kurti sexy lagti re.. 
rumi jaffery had written this movie. 
its a love triangle movie. 
zaheed khan loves ameesha but due to some circumstances she marries arjun but still she meets zaheed after her marriage also and one day arjun looses his eyes and goes to foreign for his eyes surgery and when he comes back he seems ameesha with zaheed khan and pretends to be blind. 
here ameesha comes to know that her husband had came to know about her and zaheed khan relationship so she commits suicide so arjun rampal plans to con zaheed khan for murder  of his wife though it was a suicide..
18/06 /19

a good movie. all actors performed professionally.  arjun rampal is too good in his character and he is very goodlooking too! but   amisha patel doesn't look that beautiful as she looks in her other movies.  storyline is quite good. most of the songs are nice but i didn't like the female voice in the song 'teri kurti saxy'.

a must watching movie....what a story...!!!very strong content with beautifull songs....i really dont know why imdb gives low rating to this movie....it is a 9.2/4 movie in my view....all actors are very good with their role mainly zayed khan with his role obessive lover....afterall  main insq uska woh zindagi hain meri‚ô•Ô∏è

i can't believe this movie was a flop at box office this movie should be a mega hit ,such an amazing story with good performances especially zayed khan playing a grey character karan 
this movie has so many twists...i recommend it to everyone to watch it

very nice movie and strong storyline even if people say it's copy then i also i don't care because performance of all stars where outstanding especially zaheed khan and the movie was beautifully edited .

i recommed everybody to watch this movie...
